column1: MRI image size (256, 256, 1) of a human head of a man of 37 years old in weighting T2, of coronal section. We observe slice n°40 starting from the back of the skull. We see clearly: the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 2581.3477 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 4001.2207 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 172.7051 mm³, the white matter of left hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 730.3711 mm³, the left cerebellar cortex of volume 2473.2422 mm³, the fourth ventricle of volume 29.0039 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 2543.1152 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 3960.3516 mm³, the right lateral ventricle of volume 131.8359 mm³, the white matter of right hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 706.6406 mm³ and the right cerebellar cortex of volume 2453.4668 mm³.
